name: Capital Road Development
description: Citizens who acquire a City Road Permit are eligible for payment per dirt road tamped and stone or asphalt road placed on Capital roads.

properties.Title: City Road Permit Acquisition
properties.UserDescription: Citizens who pay a deposit of â‚¬100 to the designated Federal Capital account are granted a City Road Permit which gives permission to work on Capital roads. The Mayor or Deputy Mayor reserve the right to suspend City Road Permits from Citizens who exploit the system in any way, without refund, at their discretion.

List.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="TransferMoney">Direct Transfer</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="TransferMoney">Direct Transfer</ecoicon>: The reason of the transfer.

User.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who transfered the money.

Left.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="TransferMoney">Currency Amount</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="TransferMoney">Currency Amount</ecoicon>: The amount of money transfered.

Person.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who transfered the money.

PeopleToSendTo.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who transfered the money.

properties.Title: City Road Permit Refund
properties.UserDescription: City Road Permits may be refunded at the discretion of the Mayor or Deputy Mayor.

properties.Title: Tamping Payout
properties.UserDescription: Citizens who hold a City Road Permit are eligible for payment of â‚¬0.1 per road tile tamped.

properties.Title: Stone Road Payout
properties.UserDescription: Citizens who hold a City Road Permit are eligible for payment of â‚¬1.25 per Stone Road tile placed, and a penalty of the equivalent amount per Stone Road tile removed.

properties.Title: Payment Resolution
properties.UserDescription: Periodically resolve payment to and from Citizens.

properties.Title: Penalty Resolution
properties.UserDescription: Any tax paid by a Citizen to the Capital Road Fund shall be used to resolve any debt incurred by penalty from removing Stone or Asphalt roads.

Person.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who paid.

Count.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="PayTax">Currency Amount</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="PayTax">Currency Amount</ecoicon>: The amount of tax paid.

properties.Title: Query
properties.UserDescription: Allow Citizens to query their road payment stats.

properties.Title: Road Permission
properties.UserDescription: Citizens with the City Road Permit may dig on roads to enable placement of Stone or Asphalt road tiles.
